creator: j.vanbemmel@home.nl
text: The 'apply' tag has a parameter 'skipemptyfilesets' which, when set to true,should skip empty filesets. This is not the case if also 'parallel=true'In ExecuteOn.java function runExec, the condition "if (parallel)' should IMObe changed to:if (parallel && (!skipEmpty || fileset.size()>0)) {	...
